titleStmt.title: The turtle doue. Or, the wooing in the wood being a pleasant new song of two constant louers. To the tune of, the north countrie lasse.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcocke,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from STC, which gives 1628-1629 as publication date.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
